entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
